description:
Tokuoka Jun`ichirou is the former director of Japanese-language version of the game The World.
During his work he learned about strange events taking place in the game when players loose consciousness and fall to coma. Since the company - CC Corp - did not want to admit there is a flaw in the game, he was forced to resign from his position. He blamed himself as well as CC Corp for not realizing the flaw in the game earlier; as a result, he started investigating the comatose victims and their possible connection to find the main cause of this effect to get a proof against CC Corp.
His investigations lead him to http://anidb.net/ch9967 [Mai Minase] - a girl who felt unconscious, but awake shortly after. To help her boyfriend http://anidb.net/ch60065 [Tomonari Kasumi], who is still in coma, Mai agree to help him with his investigations. The clues they gather lead them to other two characters mentioned in the logs of Sieg, a character of Tomonari - Yuki-chin (http://anidb.net/ch9968 [Yuki Aihara]) and Kyo (http://anidb.net/ch9969 [Kyoko Tohno]). Together, they investigate the strange events taking place in The World as well as in the reality around them. In the end, they come across reference to the Epitaph of Twilight, a poem on whose bases The World was created. By the same time, they are contacted by Helba, a wavemaster and a skilled hacker offering them a help ... .
name: Tokuoka Jun`ichirou
